titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation, for preventing and punishing immorality and prophaneness.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the Executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd ...

notesStmt.note: Royal arms with "W R" at top of sheet.
"Given at Our Court at Kensington the Four and twentieth Day of February, 1697. In the Tenth Year of Our Reign."
Reproduction of original in: Guildhall Library (London, England)
